sn35.79:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe…
sn35.79:1.2: ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.79:1.3: “atthi nu kho, bhante, eko dhammo yassa pahana bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati”ti?
sn35.79:2.1: “Atthi kho, bhikkhu, eko dhammo yassa pahana bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati”ti.
sn35.79:3.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, eko dhammo yassa pahana bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati”ti?
sn35.79:4.1: “Avijja kho, bhikkhu, eko dhammo yassa pahana bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati”ti.
sn35.79:5.1: “Katham pana, bhante, janato, katham passato bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati”ti?
sn35.79:6.1: “Cakkhum kho, bhikkhu, aniccato janato passato bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati. Rupe … cakkhuvinnanam … cakkhusamphassam …
sn35.79:6.2: yampidam, cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi aniccato janato passato bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati …pe…
sn35.79:6.3: manam aniccato janato passato bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati. Dhamme … manovinnanam … manosamphassam …
sn35.79:6.4: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi aniccato janato passato bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati.
sn35.79:6.5: Evam kho, bhikkhu, janato evam passato bhikkhuno avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati”ti.
